title: Protects directors, officers and trustees of certain corporations from liability
summary: Limits the civil liability of directors, officers and trustees of corporations described in Ãµ501 (c) (4) of the internal revenue code (charitable organizations) under provisions that limit their civil liability in certain cases.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to liability of directors, officers and trustees of certain corporations
